name: Digimi - Play & Meet friends
description:
Create, Play and Make Friends!

Create your unique personalities and customize the world. Experience distinguished lives as you choose careers, parties and friends all over the world.

MAKE UP PERSONALIZATION

Customize looks with distinct appearances, hairstyles, outfits and makeup traits.

HANG OUT WITH FRIENDS

Host and attend parties. Make more friends, have fun and even more relationship development.

BUILD PERFECT HOME

Build your perfect house with blocks and furniture, a place with everything you need.

Visit our official website: https://www.digimigame.com/

Join our official Discord Server: https://discord.gg/7a6n89mQc5
